name: Not The Bees! (Hatem Amer)
description:
This is a submission for the ScoreSpace x 8 Bits to Infinity Jam.

Use WASD and space bar to escape the swarm of bees chasing you. 
Enjoy, you hivewrecker!

Music by Abstraction (Tallbeard Studios)
https://itch.io/profile/tallbeard
http://abstractionmusic.com/

SFX from https://www.zapsplat.com/

Everything else by me

Cheers <3
